This section is about **how to perform a specific task**. If you want to **understand how a certain component works, please see** :ref:`understand`

The rest of the page assumes you installed using the ansible playbooks from `wire-server-deploy <https://github.com/wireapp/wire-server-deploy/tree/master/ansible>`__

For any command below, first ssh into the server:

::

   ssh <name or IP of the VM>
